seo.title: Targeted Advertising in New York City | Broadsign Billboard & OOH Packages
seo.description: Advertise in New York City with Broadsign's targeted billboard and OOH inventory packages. Reach your audience at prime locations, venues, and points of interest throughout NYC. Maximize your advertising impact with Broadsign's strategic placements.

hero.title: Billboard and Out-of-Home Advertising in New York City
blurb: Looking to advertise in New York City? Unlock targeted advertising opportunities with Broadsign's curated billboard and OOH inventory packages. Reach your audience wherever they are with inventory strategically placed to target specific venue types, locations, and points of interest throughout NYC.

opportunities.title: Unlock advertising opportunities in NYC
opportunities.blurb: As the #1 media market in the U.S., the opportunities for out-of-home and billboard advertising in New York City are extensive.

list.title: Demographics & Diversity
list.blurb: A rich blend of cultures, backgrounds, and lifestyles, the city's diverse market offers significant possibilities for advertisers to connect with a broad spectrum of desirable consumers.

features.text: 8.5 million people and 3.1 million households across the five boroughs
52% of the population made up of women
Average population age of 37 years old

list.title: Income & Education
list.blurb: New York City is a highly desirable market with a population that surpasses the national average education and income levels.

features.text: Over 45% of residents have a college degree or higher

list.title: Transportation & Travel
list.blurb: The city holds one of the busiest and most extensive transportation networks in the world.

features.text: Home to three major airports (La Guardia, JFK, Newark)
Over 60 million tourists visit each year
Nearly 1 million workers enter NYC every day, representing 20% of the city's workforce

topPackages.title: Explore digital OOH inventory packages for top audience segments in NYC
topPackages.blurb: See our curated billboard and screen packages tailored for specific audiences around top advertising verticals in New York City. Each package includes diverse environments, venue types, and demographics to boost brand visibility.
